title: Suffer the Children
description: Dangerous Rovers. Mutated Children. A dire situation. A genetic experiment unleashed a devastating virus and humanity struggles to survive. When one of a small band of survivors is mauled by a grotesquely mutated child, the group is left with a harrowing decision that threatens to reveal their townâ€™s darkest secrets. "The best horror stories touch our most basic, primal fears and Suffer the Children does exactly this. This is a grim, fast-paced story with teeth." -Jason Dias, author of For Love of Their Children
author: Janden Hale
